record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business to come before the Senate today and if the Republican leader has no further business, I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 5:12 p.m., adjourned until Tuesday, February 27, 2007, at 10 a.m.
